name: ASTROFROG
description:
Frog crashes on his way back to frog planet and must reclaim his ship by hopping through space. You can't control his movement, only his jump.

A sort of platformer with no directional buttons. You hop from planet to planet and your direction is determined by the rotation of the planet.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Credits:

Programming / level art / credits music: @space_bake

Character Sprites: @puppiesandanime

Level Music (Free Music Archive):  Komiku

Made in GMS2 beta
